seo.title: Information website about the coronavirus in Bulgaria
seo.description: Up-to-date information and charts for the spread of coronavirus in Bulgaria

info.p1: In this website you will find intuitive graphs about the chronological development of the COVID-19 pandemic in Bulgaria.
info.p2: Check out the new visualisations about the disease spread in the pages "Tests", "Demographics", "Map", "Vaccination", and "Forecast".

charts.new_cases_today: {{count}} new cases have been announced today.
charts.new_cases_today_0: No new cases have been announced today.
charts.new_cases_today_1: A single new case has been announced today.
charts.diff_cases: The number of new cases is {{count}} {{diffType}} than yesterday.
charts.diff_cases_0: The number of new cases is the same as yesterday.

tests_diff.new_cases_today: During the last 24 hours {{count}} tests have been performed.
tests_diff.new_cases_today_0: No tests have been performed for the last 24 hours.
tests_diff.new_cases_today_1: During the last 24 hours a single test has been performed.
tests_diff.diff_cases: The number of performed tests is {{count}} {{diffType}} than yesterday.
tests_diff.diff_cases_0: The number of performed tests is the same as yesterday.

vaccinated_diff.new_cases_today: During the last 24 hours {{count}} people have been vaccinated.
vaccinated_diff.new_cases_today_0: No people have been vaccinated for the last 24 hours.
vaccinated_diff.new_cases_today_1: During the last 24 hours a single person has been vaccinated.
vaccinated_diff.diff_cases: The number of administered doses is {{count}} {{diffType}} than yesterday.
vaccinated_diff.diff_cases_0: The number of administered doses is the same as yesterday.

weekly_infected_cured_cases.title: Disease timeline of infected and cured cases by week

weekly_hospitalized_intensive_fatal_case.title: Disease timeline of hospitalized, intensive care and fatal cases by week

historical_hospitalized_intensive_care_c.title: Disease timeline of hospitalized and intensive care cases
